pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantifying Similarity of Datasets and Multivariate Two- And k-Sample Testing // A collection of methods for quantifying the similarity of two or more datasets, many of which can be used for two- or k-sample testing. It provides newly implemented methods as well as wrapper functions for existing methods that enable calling many different methods in a unified framework. The methods were selected from the review and comparison of Stolte et al. (2024) doi:10.1214/24-SS149.
